column4: DESIGNER NOTE: Copy to the right should be static and visible as the customer inputs data, then disappear and switch to the next below.
column5: Kids often keep their money is a special box or crammed into their wallet so they can give anyone a immediate answer to "what is your net worth." But when life gets more complicated, the answer isn't so simple. Use this calculator to help add up your net worth.

column4: DESIGNER NOTE: This copy should appear AFTER the customer inputs their information and the calculator does its thing.
column5: Is what you have worth protecting? The answer might surprise you and the strategies that can be used might even be more eye opening. We can help you explore your options.
